statements: UPDATE UserProfiles SET travel_preferences = '{"destination": "Maldives", "budget": 5000}' WHERE user_id = 12345
UPDATE UserProfiles SET past_trips = '{"places_visited": ["Paris", "Tokyo", "New York"]}' WHERE username = 'john_doe'
UPDATE UserProfiles SET username = 'JohnDoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 12345
UPDATE UserProfiles SET past_trips = '{"city": "Paris", "year": 2019}' WHERE user_id = 67890
UPDATE user_profiles SET username='john_doe', age=30 WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE trips SET destination='Paris', start_date='2022-08-15', trip_duration=7 WHERE trip_id=201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE trips SET start_date='2023-07-15', trip_duration=7 WHERE trip_id=101;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE past_trips SET rating = 5, destination = 'Paris' WHERE trip_id = 201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE past_trips SET trip_date = '2022-08-15', rating = 5 WHERE trip_id = 456;
UPDATE user_profiles SET city='New York', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET budget_range=2000, preferred_season='Summer' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name='John Doe', city='New York', country='USA' WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE past_trips SET destination='Paris', trip_duration=7 WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET age = 30, nationality = 'French' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE TravelPreferences SET budget = 5000.00, duration = 7 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE TravelPreferences SET budget = 5000.00, duration = 7 WHERE user_id = 456 AND travel_type = 'Adventure';
